CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper August 25, 1951, pg. 7, reads: "All Eyes on Artist - The Rev. and Mrs. John W. P. Collier Jr. and Johnnie III toured the Courier plant Tuesday as part of their Pittsburgh visit.  They are pictured watching Courier artist, Wilbert L. Holloway, draw one of his famous pictures.  The Rev. Mr. Collier hails from Newark, N. J., is pastor of the Israel AME Church and the head of the Religious Education set-up of the First Episcopal District. The Colliers are one their vacation. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Rev. John W. P. Collier, Mrs. Collier, and Johnnie Collier III in cowboy costume, standing beside Pittsburgh Courier newspaper artist Wilbert L. Holloway
